import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import AuthContext from "../contexts/AuthContext"; function Login() { const { loginUser } = useContext(AuthContext); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const email = e.target.email.value; const password = e.target.password.value; email.length > 0 && loginUser(email, password); console.log(email); console.log(password); }; return ( <>
